Body:
args = self.mock_args.mock()
args.texs = {'track_4@AND@track_6': 0}
covers = {'aaa': {'5utr': {'track_4': [52, 11, 23]}, 'inter': {'track_3': [
    111]}, 'total': {'track_1': [27.52, 111]}, '3utr': {'track_1': [27.52, 
    111]}, 'interCDS': {'track_2': [12, 0]}}}
args.coverages = {'5utr': 'p_0.3', '3utr': 'n_10', 'interCDS': 'p_0.5'}
args.cover_notex = {'5utr': 'p_0.3', '3utr': 'n_10', 'interCDS': 'p_0.5'}
mediandict = sud.set_cutoff(covers, args)
self.assertDictEqual(mediandict, {'aaa': {'5utr': {'track_4': {'median': 11,
    'mean': 28.666666666666668}}, 'interCDS': {'track_2': {}}, '3utr': {
    'track_1': {}}}})
args.cover_notex = None
mediandict = sud.set_cutoff(covers, args)
self.assertDictEqual(mediandict, {'aaa': {'3utr': {'track_1': {'mean': 
    69.26, 'median': 10.0}}, '5utr': {'track_4': {'mean': 
    28.666666666666668, 'median': 11}}, 'interCDS': {'track_2': {'mean': 
    6.0, 'median': 0}}}})
